name: Xcode User State File
summary: An XCUSERSTATE file contains information configuring the visual workspace in Apple Xcode, an IDE for macOS. Examples of information it stores include the current files displayed in the workspace and the cursor's position. XCUSERSTATE files contain binary data and are not meant to be opened by a user; Xcode automatically creates the file and references it when loading a workspace or project.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: XCUSERSTATE file open in Apple Xcode 14
